description:
nova-manage service list is an administration command and a tenant should not be able to run as a tenant.
When running as a tenant user ( role _member_) 'nova-manage service list ' shows the normal output as the one seen when running as 'admin'.
title: nova-manage service list should not be allowed for a tenant

comments.content:
nova-manage service list is an administration command and should a tenant should not be able to run as a tenant.
When running as a tenant user ( role _member_) 'nova-manage service list ' shows the normal output as the one seen when running as 'admin'.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~itzikb1

comments.content: nova-manage doesn't use the REST API it uses internal nova python APIs and must be run on a machine with nova.conf (and DB access). I am unclear what the specific bug is here, can you elaborate.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
